DOC.brief_summary: The aim study detect whether perform endometrial sample cycle precede ovulation induction clomiphene citrate improve pregnancy outcomes next cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Local Endometrial Injury Pregnancy Outcomes During Ovulation Induction Cycles
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize use list computer generate random sample two group : Group 1 : Couples undergo endometrial sample luteal phase cycle precede ovulation induction clomiphene citrate . Group 2 : Couples undergo ovulation induction clomiphene citrate . The drug choose ovulation induction group clomephine citrate . Timing technique endometrial sampling : Timing : day 15 day 24 cycle precede ovulation induction cycle . Technique : do use pipelle method ( Williams et al. , 2008 ) . The procedure follow : 1 . Vaginal speculum expose uterine cervix sterilization saline . 2 . The piston position extreme distal end sheath Pipelle insert gently cervical canal cavity uterus . 3 . While hold sheath position one hand , hand rapidly pull piston firmly without interruption . 4 . A negative pressure within sheath draw tissue curette open distal end sheath capture separate tissue within lumen .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male partner normal semen count motility accord world health organization criterion ( Murray et al. , 2012 ) . 2 . Primary , secondary unexplained infertility least one year . 3 . Failure conceive clomiphene citrate spite good follicular response least 3 cycle . 4 . Age vary 2035 year least one year infertility . 5 . Body mass index 1930 kg/m2 . 6 . Day 2 serum FSH < 12 IU/ml . 7 . Normal uterine cavity hystrosalpingography . 8 . At least one patent tube normal appearance HSG . 9 . No previous attempt intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . 1 . Infertility due tubal factor male factor . 2 . Intrauterine organic pathology ( myoma , polyp , adhesion ) hystrosalpingogram diagnostic hysteroscope . 3 . Hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism .
